@TurnText:
'TOUCHDOWN!' The voice comes from the TV. Your Fantasy Football team just lost completely and utterly. You knew that football players often have early onset brain degradation, but why did it have to happen to your guys instead of the other guys? Your 'friends' gather around you. The loser's punishment is to record and post a political rant for the internet. What do you make it about?
1) Octopus rights
2) Reducing AI risks
3) Housing costs
4) Achieving immortality

A lady runs up to you with a baby. Well, I want to say baby, but its more of a toddler. He gives you a scowl. 'Please kiss my baby, Oh Wise Leader!'
1) Kiss the baby.
2) Bribe the baby. 
3) Fight the baby. 
4) Ignore the baby
